attributes.action: statutory pension age to be restored. The retirement age to be changed
attributes.additional_details:
Pension age should be lowered for people between 1950 to 1964 as it’s not fair on people who paid enough for there pension, you are making people suffer, especially the disabled

Poland have changed there’s to 60 for women and 65 for men 

Disabled people should be able to retire age 60 as cannot work
attributes.background: Lower the pension for women who where born before 1964 as we have been given no time to sort especially like Poland

rejection.details:
You may wish to resubmit your petition, outlining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may also wish to consider signing this petition: Lower the state pension age to 65, available here -
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636457
